message.content:
I need to identify the total income from ordinary activities in this income statement, along with its constituent line items.

Looking at the income statement:
- "Total Revenue" appears to be the line item representing total income, with a value of 3956433.90
- The constituent sub-item is "Main Business Revenue" with a value of 3956433.90

This makes sense because:
1. "Total Revenue" represents the income from ordinary activities
2. "Main Business Revenue" is the only component that makes up the "Total Revenue" in this statement
3. Both have the same value (3956433.90), confirming their relationship

Therefore, the total income value is 3956433.90, and its sub-item value is also 3956433.90.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '3956433.90', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value': '3956433.90'}}}
```
